ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Name ), AND(NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Admin")),NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "IKO Power User"))), OR( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "IKOPRO Contractor"), CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "IKOPRO Contractor HA OK") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to change any fields on this page.
